text: The Tallapoosa sculpin (Cottus tallapoosae) is a species of fish in the family Cottidae. It is found in the United States in the Tallapoosa River drainage above the Fall Line in east central Alabama and west-central Georgia. It reaches a maximum length of 7.7 cm. It prefers rocky shoals and riffles of small upland streams. ==References== Category:Cottus (fish) Category:Fish described in 2007
title: Tallapoosa sculpin
